name: Runhua Xu
content: Runhua Xu @ Beihang University Runhua Xu (许,润华) is a Professor in the School of Computer Science and Engineering at Beihang University. Prior to that, he served as a Research Staff Member at IBM Research (AI S&P Solutions team). He earned his Ph.D. in Information Security from the School of Computing and Information, University of Pittsburgh, under the guidance of IEEE Fellow, Prof. James Joshi. He also holds an M.S. in Computer Science from Beihang University, where he was advised by Prof. Bo Lang, and a B.E. in Software Engineering from NWPU.
